logentry.msg: Added a test to check if the problem when deleting a entity of a subclass of Persistable deletes also the entry in the super RecordStore.

logentry.author: thiagolm
logentry.msg: Fixed a problem when deleting subclasses of a Persistable. Now the entry in the super RecordStore are also deleted.

logentry.author: thiagolm
logentry.msg: Improved the javadoc.

logentry.author: thiagolm
logentry.msg: Improved the exception handler mechanism. Added the deleteAll(), deleteAll(Class) and isPersisted(Persistable) methods. Added a class to handle the version information.

logentry.author: thiagolm
logentry.msg: Change the way that RecordStore are obtained. Now every Persistable class have a attribute called PersistableMetadata that has information about the Persistable class, for now, the only information is the RecordStoreName. This was done because the obfusctaion process that some developer use in their applications.

logentry.author: thiagolm
logentry.msg: Change the way that RecordStore are obtained. Now every Persistable class have a attribute called PersistableMetadata that has information about the Persistable class, for now, the only information is the RecordStoreName. This was done because the obfusctaion process that some developer use in their applications.
